function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Flare ups of COVID-19 continuing to plague humanity for several years","Impact":"Continued health risks and economic disruptions","Mitigation":"Vaccination, public health measures, and global cooperation","Technologies":"Vaccine development, testing and distribution technologies","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable communities","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Emergence of other zoonotic coronaviruses as a threat to humans","Impact":"Potential for new pandemics and health crises","Mitigation":"Surveillance of animal reservoirs, regulation of wildlife trade, and research on zoonotic diseases","Technologies":"Diagnostic testing, genome sequencing, and wildlife conservation technologies","People":"Public health agencies, wildlife conservation organizations, and scientific research institutions","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, and scientific research institutions"},{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 through aerosols and surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of person-to-person and surface-to-person transmission","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation, hygiene measures, and public health education","Technologies":"Air filtration, disinfection technologies, and health monitoring devices","People":"Indoor workers, public transportation users, and event attendees","Owner":"Employers, public transportation authorities, and event organizers"}]}
